bioghist.p: Philadelphia Mothers Meeting was a charitable sewing group in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: This is a volume of rules and accounts of the Philadelphia Mothers Meeting. The list of rules for the club specify membership requirements and responsibilities. The main portion of the volume lists members names, what materials they have been given, the cost per yard of the material, and payments. There is also a list of reductions for different types of garments, and weekly payment totals for the materials. The volume is indexed by member's name.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
